name: Super Embaixadinha Soares
description:
Observation:

I was doing an entry for the Brazilian Meme Game Jam when I discovered that there was another jam happening being hosted by Extra Credits so this is an entry for both jams. É por isso que tudo vai estar escrito em inglês!

Based on this movie clip:

Super Embaixadinha Soares

It is a game about surviving as long the on going attack of piranhas. Not only that, but you need to keep your revolver away from the ground, touching it will give you a game over. So don't get your dodging skils and revolver malabarism tactics on a twist!

Playing 101

Just click near the revolver to give it some impulse. The direction it goes or rotates is determined from which position you clicked, don't worry sounds harder than it actually is!

Credits

All music was made by Mittsies:

  • Stratum (Filthy House Remix)
  • Departure
  • Oxide
  • Gravity

I also used both Sabo font variants made by that nice gentleman
